name: Lethargy
description: A creature with this curse requires twice as much time on any rest.

name: Slow Death
description: A creature with the curse of slow death has disadvantage on saves to heal wounds or against death effects. They cannot regain defence.

name: Debilitating Pain
description: A creature with the curse of debilitating pain never stops feeling any pain they feel. Any time they take a wound they must make a will save or take 1d6 sanity damage. The DC is 10 + any wound taken after this curse. For each wound taken the dice also increased by one size.

name: Polymorph
description: The target of this curse is turned into a creature of the casterâ€™s choice. The target cannot return to their true form until the curse is lifted.
